articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to January 18 General Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to January 18 General Machine Plant
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the January 18 General Machine Plant.
					 While visiting the remodeled plant in December last year, he set forth the task to develop and produce modern machines of Korean-style and took measures for doing so.
					
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the plant, he said that it looked nicer than what he saw last year and its production processes have been updated to successfully develop and produce world-level machines in a short span of time. He was pleased to say that its huge remodeling project was difficult but it splendidly undertook it with determination.
					
					 Every place of the plant is associated with footprints of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted, underscoring the need for its workers to intensify the drive for keeping the production going at a high rate with the pride and honor of working at the plant associated with immortal leadership exploits of the great leaders and the eldest son-like plant and pivot and core one in the nation's machine-building industry.
					
					 He went round manufacturing, assembling and other processes of the plant to learn in detail about the production there and quality of machines.
					
					 Eye-opening changes unimaginable in the past have taken place in the production and management and operation of the plant as it was modernized as required by the trend of the industrial development in the 21st century, he noted, adding:
					
					 The plant has been put on a scientific, IT, automated and unmanned basis on a high level and a flexible manufacturing system established to cut down the production cycle and boost output while saving manpower as much as possible and register laudable successes in raising quality.
					
					 The performance of machines serially produced at the plant markedly improved as compared with that in the past, he said, noting with pleasure that they could match the products well known to the world in quality index.
					
					 He recalled that the plant developed and manufactured new type machines in cooperation with a relevant unit, stressing this is of great significance in developing the nation's machine-building industry.
					
					 The longer he sees the machines, the dearer and more precious treasures they look like as they were designed and produced with indigenous wisdom and efforts, he said, adding that to produce modern Korean-style machines with indigenous efforts, technology and resources is an important work for preserving the national self-respect.
					
					 Saying he was pleased to hear the sound of machines running to boost production at the worksites updated at a high level, he highly praised the officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the plant for locally developing and producing world-level machines.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the plant, while underscoring the importance of its duty.
					
					 He visited the comprehensive welfare service facilities of the plant.
					
					 These comprehensive sports and welfare service facilities were built under the warm loving care of Kim Jong Un as he personally guided their layout and sent construction force for the project and took measures for supplying building materials for it.
					
					 He went round a gym, swimming pool, dinning room, bath house, beauty salon and other places of the facilities to learn in detail about their operation.
					
					 They are splendid, indeed, and such facilities can be built in our country, the society for the workers, he said, adding that the officials and servants of the facilities should steadily improve service and management and operation so that the Party's care may better reach the workers.
					
					 Calling on the workers of the plant to dash ahead at the speed of Mallima and bring about a great leap forward in producing ultra-modern machines urgently required by various sectors of the national economy, he gave instructions to serially produce the state-of-the-art machines newly manufactured by the plant and the militant tasks to be carried out by it in the future and personally took measures for doing so.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Yu Jin and Hong Yong Chil, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Ugandan President
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a reply message to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on July 22.
					 The message expressed deep thanks to the Ugandan president for sending a warm message highly praising the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Initiation of Movement for Land Management Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Initiation of Movement for Land Management Marked
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on the 20th anniversary of the general mobilization for land management initiated by leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Choe Pu Il, Ro Tu Chol and Kim Su Gil, officials of armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and other officials and working people of industrial establishments in the city.
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, said in a report:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il published the work "On Bringing About a Fresh Change in Land Management" on August 11, Juche 85 (1996), clarifying an original idea of conducting land management through all party and social campaign. This marked an important event in ushering in an epochal turn in land construction and management.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published many works till the last moments of his life since the general mobilization for land management started, providing important guidelines to be held fast to in the land management in every period and at every stage of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Under his leadership, the general mobilization for land management made brisk headway across the country. As a result, a new history of land construction started and there appeared new sceneries in the Songun era such as vast expanse of Handre plain, Poman-ri fairyland and Ullim falls. Lots of structures of eternal value were built in various parts of the country and streets and villages turned into a socialist fairyland.
					
					 He kindled the torch of the movement for the general mobilization for land management in the difficult period of the arduous march, the forced march and turned the country into the socialist land of bliss for the people and the socialist fairyland. His leadership feats will remain shining forever.
					
					 His Juche-oriented idea of land management and leadership are being successfully carried forward by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, who is making a new history of the country's prosperity.
					
					 The reporter said all successes and changes made in the land construction and management in the last two decades are ascribable to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un who energetically led the struggle to carry out the policy of the movement for the general mobilization of land management.

articles.title: Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Youth Movement Museum
articles.content:
Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Youth Movement Museum
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Syrian Ambassador to the DPRK Tammam Sulaiman and his embassy officials visited the Youth Movement Museum on Wednesday on the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Syria. 
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing among youth and children at the main lobby and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round photos, historical mementoes and data dealing with feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Romanian Embassy Officials Visit Mausoleum of King Tongmyong
articles.content:
Romanian Embassy Officials Visit Mausoleum of King Tongmyong
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- George Amihaesei Nicolescu, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Romanian embassy here, and its officials visited the Mausoleum of King Tongmyong on Wednesday.
					 They looked round various places of the Mausoleum which was successfully built as befitting the one of the founder-king of Koguryo, a powerful state that existed in the East for a thousand years, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Abnormal Hot Weather Lasts in DPRK
articles.content:
Abnormal Hot Weather Lasts in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Abnormal hot weather continues from early August throughout the DPRK.
					 According to information data available at the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, the mean air temperature was 32.6 degrees on Aug. 3-8, 4.1 degrees higher than the average.
					
					 On Aug. 4-7, the daily mean maximum temperature varies between 29.6 degrees and 36.5 degrees Celsius in the west coastal area, 30.9 and 37.8 in the central inland area, 27.3 and 38.3 in the northern inland area and 29.3 and 37.5 in the east coastal area. 
					
					 On Aug. 5, 38.3 degrees was recorded in the area of Hyesan, Ryanggang Province, 1.2 degrees higher than the highest one observed on July 24, 1997 and 37.8 degrees in Suphung of North Phyongan Province, 0.8 degrees higher than the extremum temperature on Aug. 6, 1989. 
					
					 Temperature overpast the extremums in the areas of Kyonghung, Pyoksong, Sinwon, Songhwa, Kosan and Sinchon with 36.5 to 38.3 degrees and in the areas of Usi, Sijung, Sinphyong, Paechon, Anak and Samchon with 35.2 to 37.8 degrees.
					
					 High pressure formed in Tibet area was mixed with high pressure above the northwest Pacific, causing unusual hot weather.
					
					 This abnormal atmospheric circulation is forecast to continue for coming days and the high pressure, which causes unusual hot weather, to weaken before or after August 15.

articles.title: WIPO Medal and Certificate Awarded to DPRK Inventors
articles.content:
WIPO Medal and Certificate Awarded to DPRK Inventors
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK succeeded in making a LED floodlight with auxiliary reflector.
					 They developed a technology of focusing over 90 percent of bunch light on object by adding an auxiliary reflector to the main one.
					
					 The new floodlight has been introduced at 100-odd units across the country, proving very economic. It is 95 percent lower than existing ones in power consumption, but 5-10 times brighter.
					
					 Its developers were recently awarded a WIPO medal for inventors and certificate.

articles.title: 6th Rason International Trade Exhibition Goes On in DPRK
articles.content:
6th Rason International Trade Exhibition Goes On in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The 6th Rason International Trade Exhibition is going on with large attendance in the DPRK.
					 The exhibition, opened on August 8, brings together over 100 companies from the DPRK, China, Russia, Germany, UK, Italy and other countries and regions.
					
					 On display at the exhibition are about 100 000 products of over 600 kinds, including machinery, products using natural energy, electric and electronic goods, light industrial goods, foodstuffs, consumer goods, pharmaceuticals, building and chemical materials and vehicles.
					
					 Ro Yong Nam, director of the Economic Cooperation Department under the Rason City People's Committee, said that the exhibition will show the development of the Rason Economic and Trade Zone.
					
					 We will encourage mutual development and prosperity through many-sided and efficient contacts and transactions, he added.
					
					 The exhibition will last till August 11.

articles.title: Revolutionary Museum of Mansudae Art Studio Opens
articles.content:
Revolutionary Museum of Mansudae Art Studio Opens
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary museum of the Mansudae Art Studio was newly built and opened.
					 On display at the general review hall and rooms of the museum are the color statue of leader Kim Jong Il, photos of the peerlessly great men, their propositions and 1 000 odd historical mementoes in chronological order and contents.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the studio Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials, employees and persons of merits of the studio.
					
					 They laid a floral basket before the statue of Kim Jong Il at the general review hall.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam in an opening address said the newly built revolutionary museum is of great significance in glorifying leadership exploits of the great leaders and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on all officials, creators and employees of the studio to have the pride of working at the unit visited by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and thus fulfill their mission and duty for the party and the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 After being briefed on the museum, they went round it.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Green Architecture Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Green Architecture Held
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of green architecture took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on August 9 and 10 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Attending the presentation were officials, teachers and researchers of different units including Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Architecture, the Architectural Engineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, the Natural Energy Institute, the Paektusan Architectural Institute and the State Designing Guidance Bureau.
					
					 The presentation was divided into two panels. Introduced there were more than 120 scientific and technological successes.
					
					 Exchanged there were science and technology for green architecture and its method of construction studied and developed by scientists, technicians and workers, technology for designing practice and application and experience gained in it and opinions on issues arising in production of green building materials.
					
					 During the presentation there took place a science and technology lecture.

articles.title: DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful in Asian Cup Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful in Asian Cup Tournament
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK figure skaters came back home Wednesday after taking part in the 2016 figure skating tournament for Asian Cup held in Philippines from August 4 to 7. 
					 The tournament brought together more than 120 men and women players from 15 countries and regions including the DPRK, Malaysia and Australia.
					
					 Ryom Tae Ok and Kim Ju Sik won gold medals and Pak So Hyang and Song Nam I silver medals in senior pairs events.
					
					 Ro Hyang Mi placed the second in the category B juvenile women's individual event and Han Kum Chol the third in the youth men's individual event.

articles.title: Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods
articles.content:
Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A national exhibition of August 3 consumer goods was held with large attendance in Pyongyang from August 3 to 8.
					 What caught one's eye at the exhibition were hat, men's and women's shoes and sandal, which are made of sedge.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were also housedresses, sportswear, child clothes and foodstuffs made with wild fruits, as well as different shapes of clocks made of chestnut roots.
					
					 The August 3 Consumer Goods Production Movement was initiated by leader Kim Jong Il, when he went round the Pyongyang City light industrial goods exhibition on August 3, Juche 73 (1984).
					
					 Since then, a national exhibition has taken place on the day every year.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory Marked
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 President Kim Il Sung promulgated the Law on Nationalization of Major Industries on August 10, Juche 35(1946) and thus turned the factory into the one serving the people, solving problems on the spot.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the production capacity of the factory was increased and raw materials fully supplied during the arduous time and took a revolutionary step to newly build a germ-free and automated oil-refining process and essential nutrient production process. He worked heart and soul to provide Pyongyang citizens with tasty and nutritious essential foodstuff till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The workers and officials of the factory developed it into a modern foodstuff production complex equipped with strong material and technological foundation, true to the intention of the Party to glorify the history of loving the people of the great leaders for all ages.
					
					 A meeting took place Wednesday to mark the anniversary.
					
					 Present there were Kim Su Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials concerned and the officials and employees of the factory.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the C.C., the WPK was conveyed to the workers, technicians and officials of the factory at the meeting.

articles.title: Three-point Line for National Liberation
articles.content:
Three-point Line for National Liberation
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- In the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, President Kim Il Sung set forth the three-point line for national liberation. The three-point line served as an important guideline for the Korean people to hasten the preparations for the final decisive battle and achieve the cause of national liberation by themselves.
					 From 1943, Japan and other fascist countries came to be on the decline rapidly. Under such situation, Kim Il Sung convened the meeting of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) early in 1943 and put forth the final operation plan against Japan.
					
					 The plan was aimed at accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation by means of a general offensive of the KPRA combined with a popular uprising and joint operations behind enemy lines.
					
					 The President confirmed the plan as the three-point line for the national liberation.
					
					 And according to the plan, the President issued an order to launch a general offensive on August 9, 1945 and achieved the historic cause of national liberation on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: Many Koreans and Foreigners Visit Arch of Triumph
articles.content:
Many Koreans and Foreigners Visit Arch of Triumph
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- At least 48 000 organizations and delegations and a lot of service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people of various circles, youths and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners have visited the Arch of Triumph at the foot of Moran Hill since it was built 34 years ago.
					 The Arch of Triumph is a monumental edifice built on the 70th birthday of President Kim Il Sung to glorify his revolutionary exploits in which he achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation by leading the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory and made a triumphal return to the homeland.
					
					 The visitors kept deep in their mind the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea, defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists by leading the anti-Japanese war to a victory and made a triumphal return to the homeland by achieving the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					Being briefed on sculptures in relief, they once again realized that a new history of brilliant victories and epochal changes was ushered in on this land for the first time in the history of the nation spanning 5,000 years as Kim Il Sung was held in high esteem as the leader of the Korean revolution.
					
					445,700 foreigners, overseas Koreans and south Koreans have visited the Arch of Triumphant since it was built.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Sophism to Justify THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye's Sophism to Justify THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea in a recent "state council meeting" asserted that the "north's nuke and missile threat" are being translated into a reality and the "steady conflict over the THAAD deployment makes her anxious", calling for preventing "inside division and conflict wanted by the north".
					 She even said "she is sore at heart" when she thinks of her father and mother who met untimely deaths and that "her only small wish is to defend the security" of the people.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary condemns such an action as sophism that can be made only by those having faces of brass.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The THAAD deployment is pursuant to the U.S. strategy to dominate the world, not for defending the security of the south Korean people, and the war monster poses a serious threat to their life and security. This is the stark reality.
					
					 However, traitor Park tried to justify the moves to deploy THAAD with her clumsy act. This goes to clearly prove that she is a foxy woman.
					
					 What is more detestable is that the puppet traitor is working hard to link the inside confusion and collapse in south Korea over the THAAD deployment with the DPRK. This is just a crafty trick to divert elsewhere the anger of the people, tide over the crisis and deploy THAAD in south Korea at any cost.
					
					 If the Park group of traitors keeps making steady efforts in their criminal racket to deploy THAAD while acting as a lackey of its U.S. master, despite strong denunciation and protest at home and abroad, it would bring about only the result of hastening its shameful end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Trumpeting about "North's Hacking"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Authorities' Trumpeting about "North's Hacking"
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet prosecution announced the groundless "results of the investigation" that the "organization which looks like a hacker of the north" hacked into an e-mail of a government official in the field of diplomacy and security.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says:
					
					 We witnessed more than once the poor farce the south Korean puppet regime staged to divert the public attention elsewhere whenever incidents occur within it.
					
					 The fiction about "the north's hacking" which was fabricated by the south Korean puppet authorities through the prosecution is nothing but a far-fetched assertion.
					
					 The south Korean authorities cook up cases intended to do harm to the fellow countrymen in a bid to mislead the public opinion regardless of whether there is evidence or not and whether people believe in them or not. They can never do away with this inveterate confrontation hysteria before they go to their graves.
					
					 What matters is that the puppet regime's fiction about the "north's hacking" is a cynical ploy to suppress the south Korean people's anti-"government" actions caused by its sycophantic decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 It is also aimed at cooking up the fascist "law on preventing cyber terrorism" as early as possible. .
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime's smear campaign against the DPRK would only bring to light its true colors as wicked confrontation maniacs and precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: No Haven for U.S. Pursuing Policy Hostile to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Haven for U.S. Pursuing Policy Hostile to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Experts on Korean affairs and media of the U.S. and other countries in the West are deriding the Obama administration's wretched plight of plunging itself into an abyss due to its anachronistic policy hostile to the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 The above-said fact exposed once again that the hostile policies pursued by the successive chief executives of the U.S. against the DPRK, specifically the "strategic patience" policy of the present Obama administration, all have gone belly-up.
					
					 Nevertheless, Obama who has mocked the international community by touting a "world without nuclear weapons" is persisting in nuclear intimidation against the DPRK though he has already sustained a real flop while pursuing his ill-minded "strategic patience" policy.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to persist in posing nuclear threat to the DPRK by staging nuclear war drills but it is just the U.S. itself which will be struck by bigger uneasiness and horror.
					
					 What remains to be done now by the U.S. is to make a strategic choice only: whether to terminate its policy hostile to the DPRK or to face a nuclear disaster and make its mainland disappear on this planet.
					
					 The longer the policy-makers of the U.S. persist in their wild dream, the stronger the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence and merciless strike capability will get to blow up the den of aggressors.
					
					 The U.S. will never be able to sleep a sound sleep unless it lifts its policy hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 There is no haven for those attempting to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. politicians would be well advised to face up to the changed reality and behave with reason if they don't want to see the terrible destruction of the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lambastes Japan's Arms Buildup
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lambastes Japan's Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Ministry of Defense is reportedly mulling deploying F-35 stealth fighters developed by it with the U.S. and other countries in Misawa base of Aomori Prefecture. The Japanese authorities are going to introduce four F-35s from the U.S. from October this year to March next year, a total of 42 F-35s.
					 Japan is also planning to deploy Patriot missile shield by 2020 by pushing forward its modernization.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 We cannot overlook the fact that the Japanese reactionaries are hell-bent on the purchase and deployment of modern arms and equipment.
					
					 Japan is vying with big powers in squandering an astronomic amount of military funds in a bid to deploy ultra-modern arms and equipment. Not content with this, it is busying itself with development and deployment of more modern arms and equipment. Lurking behind this scenario is Japan's intention to realize its ambition for reinvasion in contingency while getting fully ready for war preparations by joining in the moves for a new war by its U.S. master.
					
					 The touch-and-go situation is being created in the Asia-Pacific region owing to the U.S. reckless military moves.
					
					 Japan is shouting "bravo" over the war moves of its master in a bid to realize its ambition for reinvasion at any cost. Japan's overseas aggression is a matter of time as it has provided a legal guarantee for reinvasion by enforcing the "security legislation".
					
					 What remains to be done now is to bolster up its military capabilities to cope with overseas aggression war.
					
					 Japans' moves for arms buildup predict the ensuing disaster.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Regime's False Propaganda against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Regime's False Propaganda against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean puppet regime is misleading the public opinion, hyping that the DPRK will "abduct" and "commit terrorism" against south Korean travelers abroad. The regime is asserting that it is from foreign media's "news on the north". Under the instruction of Seoul, south Korean diplomats residing in foreign countries are busy holding "briefings" for south Korean travelers and calling for "ensuring their safety."
					 Against this backdrop, the regime let the conservative media including Chosun Ilbo stage false propaganda to create impression that "terrorism" by someone is imminent.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 This just reminds one of a thief crying "stop the thief!"
					
					 It is the fact known to the world that the puppet regime, steeped in the extreme idea of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, has perpetrated allurement, abduction and terrorism against DPRK citizens indiscriminately.
					
					 The regime's on-going farce is utterly impudent.
					
					 Ultimately, it is just a base farce of the regime to divert elsewhere public criticism and cover up its true colors as an evil terrorist regime.
					
					 Lurking behind this is also the ulterior design of the regime to get rid of its serious ruling crisis by turning the mounting anti-Park Geun Hye sentiments and terror-ridden atmosphere in south Korea into the climate of inciting hostility toward the compatriots.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Deploying THAAD and Setting Up Lab for Biochemical Weapons under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Deploying THAAD and Setting Up Lab for Biochemical Weapons under Fire
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The reunification vanguard of south Korea held a rally for condemning the U.S. moves for deploying THAAD and setting up a laboratory for biochemical weapons before Warf 8 of Pusan Port on August 8, according to south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 At the rally the speakers denounced the U.S. for working hard to set up the laboratory for biochemical weapons without the consent of Pusan citizens according to the "Jupiter plan".
					
					 We will never pardon such action of the U.S., they said, declaring they would fight against the authorities keen to turn south Korea into a war arsenal in league with the U.S.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants conducted information services in different parts of Pusan City.

articles.title: U.S. Deploys B-2s on Guam for Nuclear War against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Deploys B-2s on Guam for Nuclear War against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists transferred three B-2 nuclear strategic bombers to Guam, outpost for invading the DPRK from an air force base in Missouri State, according to MBC of south Korea. 
					 The U.S. strategic command confirmed it on Tuesday.
					
					 As regards it, the south Korean puppet forces are blustering that it is a "countermeasure against the north's provocation" and "a prior warning to the north Korean regime." 
					
					 The above-said action which followed the deployment of B-1B on Guam on Aug. 6 was an unprecedentedly massive deployment of air nuclear strike means, an indication of the U.S. sinister scenario to occupy the DPRK with nuclear war means involved and dominate Asia-Pacific by force.

articles.title: U.S. Deploys B-2A on Guam for Preemptive Nuclear Strike at DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Deploys B-2A on Guam for Preemptive Nuclear Strike at DPRK
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are getting ever more undisguised in their scenario for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					 They transferred three B-2A nuclear strategic bombers to the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam from the Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri State on August 9.
					
					 This arms build-up is timed to coincide with the forward-deployment of four B-1B nuclear strategic bombers in the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam after August 6.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. imperialists in steadily introducing nuclear war hardware in Asia-Pacific is to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 Pursuant to this sinister scenario, they introduced a formation of B-52Hs based on Guam into the air above south Korea in June and staged a joint drill for dropping nuclear bombs in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries. Early in July they separately staged a nuclear bomb dropping drill in the sky above south Korea without informing the puppet forces of it.
					
					 The above-said military moves clearly indicate what phase the U.S. imperialists' scenario for invading the DPRK has reached.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the massive forward-deployment of nuclear war hardware is underway with the approach of the Ulji Freedom Guardian, a joint nuclear war exercise to be staged by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have already examined at the phase of an actual war the capabilities of nuclear strategic bombers for mounting the preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. They are now mulling creating an opportunity of surprise nuclear attack in the course of the Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 These military moves only harden the will of the service personnel of the Korean People's Army to take merciless retaliatory counteraction against them.
					
					 A preemptive nuclear attack is not a monopoly of the U.S.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Urges U.S. to Stop North-targeted Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Urges U.S. to Stop North-targeted Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Ri In Suk, a Korean in the U.S., sent a letter to U.S. President Obama on August 5 urging him to stop the north-targeted joint military exercises and conclude a peace treaty with the north, according to Minjok Thongsin, an online paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 Hitting out at the U.S. and south Korea for staging large-scale joint military drills in August, Ri wrote in the letter:
					
					 These may spill over to a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The situation surrounding the north's geopolitical position has changed. Now is the time for the U.S. to roll back its outdated policy toward the north.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the joint military exercises with south Korea and opt for concluding a peace treaty with the north.

articles.title: Korean Nature Museum, Central Zoo Introduced by Mauritanian Internet News
articles.content:
Korean Nature Museum, Central Zoo Introduced by Mauritanian Internet News
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Mauritanian internet news on Aug. 4 introduced the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo in Pyongyang.
					 They reported that the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo were splendidly built as the world-level bases for cultural and leisure activities and for education true to the far-reaching plan of building a highly civilized nation advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), adding:
					
					 The Nature Museum was built on the principles of scientific accuracy, practicality and kindness in a little more than one year.
					
					 The Central Zoo was built at the highest level.
					
					 This just tells how grand the ideals and goals of the WPK are and how high the civilization enjoyed by the Korean people is.
					
					 The said construction is just thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un's warm love, who is willing to pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if this is desired by the people.
					
					 The Korean people united firmly around their leader are actively struggling to implement the WPK's plan for building a highly civilized nation.
					
					 Posted on the internet news were photos showing the interiors and exteriors of the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Accuse U.S. of Its "Jupiter Plan"
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Accuse U.S. of Its "Jupiter Plan"
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on August 3 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists' moves to plunge the Korean nation into the holocaust of germ warfare.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces worked out a "Jupiter plan" and decided to establish in south Korea a laboratory for biochemical weapons studying virulent germs of high lethality.
					
					 The Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army in a statement condemned this outrageous criminal act.
					
					 The "Jupiter plan" is pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. imperialists to stage biochemical warfare in a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 They already indiscriminately massacred the Korean people through germ and chemical warfare during the past Korean war.
					
					 Such atrocities were strongly criticized by all humankind.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' moves to set up the laboratory in south Korea fully prove their brutal nature as killers.
					
					 They make no scruple to invade socialist Korea.
					
					 Their cruelty and aggression nature put the Japanese imperialists and Hitler fascists into the shade.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the criminal "Jupiter plan."

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association published special bulletin on August 6 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation and the Day of Songun.
					 The bulletin in an article said that August 15 this year marks the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, praising President Kim Il Sung for embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens and leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 Another article said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il provided his first field guidance for his Songun revolutionary leadership to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, defending the sovereignty and independence of the country from the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' moves for aggression.
					
					 He, holding higher the banner of Songun late in the last century, resolutely frustrated the extreme moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and firmly protected the destiny of the country and nation and socialism.
					
					 Under his guidance the DPRK emerged as a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 He is boundlessly revered by all people for his great contribution to the cause of human independence with his great Songun politics.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause started and led by the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il is triumphantly advancing by the respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Articles ridiculed the U.S. imperialists rushing headlong into ruin with their hostile policy toward the DPRK to stifle it, being oblivious of the lesson taught by history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno el Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige en terreno el Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en terreno el Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero.
					En diciembre del ano pasado cuando estuvo en este Combinado, nuevamente remodelado, el Presidente presentaba la tarea de desarrollar y producir las modernas maquinarias de nuestro estilo y tomaba las medidas necesarias.
					
					Mirando el panorama de la planta, dijo que remodelaron magnificamente el Combinado mas que el ano pasado y modernizaron todos los procesos productivos y que por su resultado pudieron desarrollar y producir en corto plazo los excelentes productos mecanicos de talla mundial. Y subrayo con alegria que hicieron bien la remodelacion aunque fue muy dificil la obra.
					
					En todos los lugares del Combinado pueden encontrar con las huellas dejadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, recordo y enfatizo que los obreros de la fabrica deben hacer esfuerzos tesoneros por la normalizacion de la produccion, guardando en el corazon el infinito honor y dignidad de trabajar en el lugar de trabajo impregnado de las indelebles hazanas de la direccion de los grandes lideres y en la fabrica mayor, vertebral y medular de la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais.
					
					Recorrio varios procesos inclusive la elaboracion y el montaje, mientras que se entero detalladamente del estado productivo y la calidad de las maquinarias.
					
					Agrego que gracias a la realizacion de la modernizacion del combinado conforme a la tendencia del desarrollo industrial del siglo XXI, fueron logrados los cambios increibles e inimaginables en la produccion, la administracion y la gestion de la fabrica.
					
					Se realizaron en el nivel alto la cientifizacion, la informatizacion, la automatizacion y la produccion sin intervencion del hombre y se establecio el sistema de produccion flexible, de modo que redujeron el ciclo de produccion, aumentaron la productividad ahorrando al maximo la mano de obra y lograron los orgullosos exitos en el mejoramiento de calidad, menciono.
					
					Se mejoro notablemente mas que el pasado el funcionamiento de las maquinas que se producen en serie en este combinado, refirio y mostro alegria diciendo que los productos pueden competir dignamente con los productos reconocidos en el mundo en el indice cualitativo.
					
					En particular, bajo la cooperacion con las unidades correspondientes el combinado desarrollo y fabrico las nuevas maquinarias de gran importancia en el desarrollo de la construccion de maquinaria del pais, acoto.
					
					Se consideran como bienes mas preciosos los articulos dibujados con nuestra inteligencia y producidos con nuestras manos, senalo y continuo que elaborar las modernas maquinas de nuestro estilo apoyandose en las fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos propios deviene una labor importante para defender la dignidad nacional, agrego.
					
					Los ruidos del aumento productivo de los lugares del trabajo, preparados como palacios en que se realizo en el alto nivel la modernizacion, le dan gran alegria, subrayo y evaluo altamente las proezas de los funcionarios, los cientificos, los tecnicos y los obreros de la fabrica que desarrollan y producen las maquinarias de talla mundial basadas completamente en los recursos nacionales.
					
					Diciendo que es muy importante el deber del Combinado, presento las tareas que le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					El mismo dia, Kim Jong Un recorrio el establecimiento de servicio publico universal.
					
					Este establecimiento es el edificio universal de deportes y de servicios publicos levantado gracias a las benevolencias del Presidente quien dirigio personalmente el proyecto de formacion, envio las fuerzas de construccion y tomo las medidas para asegurar los materiales.
					
					Estando en el campo deportivo, la piscina, el comedor, el bano, la peluqueria y otros lugares se cercioro del estado de administracion.
					
					Es excelentisimo el establecimiento de servicio publico, senalo y continuo que esto puede construirse solo en nuestro pais, mundo de los obreros. Subrayo que los funcionarios y los servidores deben mejorar sin cesar el servicio, la administracion y la gestion para que los obreros disfruten mejor del amor del partido.
					
					Dijo que los obreros del combinado deben esforzarse con el impetu de Mallima por registrar un gran salto en la produccion de las maquinarias pedidas por las diversas ramas de la economia nacional y dio una orden de producir en serie las modernas maquinaras nuevamente desarrolladas y fabricadas y las tareas a cumplirse en el futuro, asi como tomo las medidas por el respecto.
					
					Le acompanaron los subjefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Jo Yong Won, Yu Jin y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta al presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta al presidente ugandes
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el 22 de julio un mensaje de respuesta al Presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Le expreso a Vd. mi profundo agradecimiento por haberme enviado un mensaje cordial elogiando las imperecederas proezas del gran Lider de nuestro pueblo, Kim Il Sung, con motivo del 22o aniversario de su deceso.

articles.title: Celebran 20o aniversario del movimiento de movilizacion para administracion territorial
articles.content:
Celebran 20o aniversario del movimiento de movilizacion para administracion territorial
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 20o aniversario de la iniciativa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre el movimiento de movilizacion general para la administracion territorial. 
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Choe Pu Il, Ro Tu Chol, Kim Su Gil, los funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales y los funcionarios y trabajadores de las instituciones y empresas de la capital. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El informante recordo que el 11 de agosto del 85 (1996) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il publico su obra "Para imprimir un nuevo viraje a la administracion del territorio nacional" y presento en ella la idea original de dinamizar la administracion del territorio nacional como una labor de todo el partido y toda la sociedad.
					
					Esto fue un acontecimiento importante que marco hito de cambio trascendental en la construccion y administracion del territorio nacional, apunto. 
					
					Desde el inicio del movimiento de movilizacion general para la administracion territorial hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida, el Dirigente publico muchas obras que sirvieron de guia programatica a ser mantenida en la administracion del territorio nacional en cada periodo y etapa de la revolucion y la construccion, subrayo. 
					
					Anadio que bajo la orientacion de el, tomo auge en ambito nacional el movimiento de ese tipo y se dio inicio a la nueva historia de construccion del territorio nacional.
					
					Como resultado, aparecieron incontables creaciones de la era del Songun como la campina Handre que se pierde en el horizonte, el paisaje paradisiaco de la comuna de Poman y los ecos de la catarata Ullim mientras se tornaron hermosas las avenidas y aldeas del pais dando el panorama de paraiso socialista, dijo. 
					
					Prosiguio que brillaran generacion tras generacion las proezas de guia del Dirigente quien en el periodo de la Marcha Penosa, la forzada, tomo la iniciativa del movimiento en cuestion y convirtio el territorio nacional en el paraiso socialista del pueblo. 
					
					Asevero que la autoctona idea y orientacion del Dirigente en materia de administracion territorial continuan perfectamente gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien escribe la nueva historia de la prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					Puntualizo que todos los exitos y cambios alcanzados a lo largo de 20 anos en esta rama son nobles frutos de la sabia orientacion del Dirigente y el Mariscal que condujeron incansablemente las labores para la materializacion de la orientacion sobre el movimiento mencionado.

articles.title: Marcha con exito la VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Marcha con exito la VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar en Corea la VI Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason, iniciada el dia 8.
					En esta ocasion participan mas de 100 entidades de la RPDC, China, Rusia, Alemania, Gran Bretana, Italia y otros paises y regiones.
					
					Se exhiben mas de 100 mil mercancias de mas de 600 variedades, entre otras, las maquinas, articulos de uso de energias naturales, efectos electricos y electronicos, productos de industria ligera, alimentos, articulos de uso diario, medicamentos, materiales de construccion y quimicos, vehiculos.
					
					Toman auge cada dia mas la propaganda de mercancias, el intercambio cientifico y tecnico y las actividades comerciales entre las empresas, companias comerciales y personalidades de varios paises y regiones.
					
					Ro Yong Nam, director de Cooperacion Economica del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Rason, dijo a la ACNC como sigue:
					
					Durante la exhibicion, los participantes seran testigos del proceso de desarrollo de la Zona Economica y Comercial de Rason. Aprovechandola, dinamizaremos el contacto y el negocio multilaterales y eficientes para lograr el desarrollo y prosperidad comunes.
					
					La feria terminara el dia 11.

articles.title: Inaugurado museo en la Casa de Creacion Mansudae
articles.content:
Inaugurado museo en la Casa de Creacion Mansudae
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la Casa de Creacion Mansudae se construyo nuevamente el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria.
					En el hall de presentacion general y varias salas se ven la estatua en color del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, las fotografias de los grandes Lideres y las tabletas con sus tesis inscritas, asi como mas de mil objetos expuestos segun sus contenidos y por orden cronologico.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion del museo tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la explanada frente a las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, erigidas en la Casa de Creacion Mansudae.
					
					Estuvieron presentes aqui el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios interesados y los funcionarios, empleados y ameritados de la entidad.
					
					Los participantes depositaron cesto de flores ante la estatua de pie del Dirigente levantada en el hall de presentacion general.
					
					Al pronunciar la palabra inaugural, Kim Ki Nam dijo que la construccion del museo y la exposicion de objetos y datos tienen gran significado para hacer brillar las hazanas de direccion de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Exhorto a todos los funcionarios, creadores y empleados a cumplir su mision asumida ante el Partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo con orgullo de trabajar en la entidad donde estan conservadas las huellas de direccion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes escucharon la explicacion general y recorrieron el museo.

articles.title: EE.UU. ubica mas bombarderos en la isla Guam para atacar a la RPDC
articles.content:
EE.UU. ubica mas bombarderos en la isla Guam para atacar a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se torna cada vez mas abierta la siniestra intencion de los Estados Unidos de asestar un golpe preventivo nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El dia 9, los imperialistas norteamericanos emplazaron en la base aerea Anderson de la isla Guam tres bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-2A, provenientes del enclave Whiteman del Estado Missouri.
					
					Este aumento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares coincide con el despliegue despues del dia 6 de los 4 bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B en la base aerea Anderson.
					
					Detras de la introduccion sucesiva de los equipos mortiferos de guerra nuclear en la region de Asia-Pacifico esta el malsano intento del imperialismo norteamericano de ejecutar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Por eso, en junio pasado, llego al cielo surcoreano la escuadrilla de B-52H, estacionada permanentemente en la isla Guam, y ella desarrollo los ejercicios conjuntos de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares con los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					A principios de julio, hizo otro tanto de manera independiente sin avisarlo a los titeres surcoreanos siquiera.
					
					Los mencionados movimientos militares dejan conocer a que grado llega el intento norteamericano de agredir a la RPDC.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que todo eso tiene lugar en visperas del inicio de Ulji Freedom Guardian, ejercicios de guerra nuclear EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					El imperialismo norteamericano, que ya reviso en la fase de batalla real el golpe preventivo nuclear de los bombarderos estrategicos contra la RPDC, intenta crear la oportunidad de asestarlo de manera sorpresiva durante Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					Los sospechosos pasos militares de EE.UU. hacen al Ejercito Popular de Corea redoblar la voluntad de contragolpe implacable.
					
					El ataque preventivo nuclear no es un monopolio de EE.UU.
